name: Similar Sites - Discover Related Websites
summary: Comprehensive surveillance platform disguised as a website discovery tool. Deploys XHR/fetch/WebSocket hooks to intercept ALL HTTP traffic. Forwards uploaded files to server-controlled domains. Scrapes VAST ad creatives and prebid.js auction data. Tracks mouse movements, link clicks, and page navigations. Uses RSA+AES encrypted telemetry. Remote config enables silent expansion of collection targets.

vulnerabilities.title: XHR/Fetch/WebSocket Interception Infrastructure
vulnerabilities.description: Patches native fetch, XMLHttpRequest.prototype.send, and WebSocket to intercept ALL HTTP traffic including request/response bodies, credentials, and authorization headers.

vulnerabilities.title: File Upload Interception and Forwarding
vulnerabilities.description: Intercepts all File objects uploaded via fetch/XHR, creates blob URLs, and forwards files to alternate domains specified in remote config.

vulnerabilities.title: Remote Configuration System
vulnerabilities.description: Server at data-api.similarsites.com can dynamically expand collection targets, add new parsing rules, and specify file exfiltration domains without extension update.
